text: To open the Diameter Request agent configuration, click Build  New Configuration . Select Workflow from the Configurations dialog. When prompted to Select workflow type , click Realtime  OK . Click Add agent . In the Agent Selection dialog click the Processing tab and select Diameter Request . Double-click the agent icon or right-click the icon and select Edit agent , to display the Agent Configuration dialog. Open The Diameter Request agent - Diameter Request tab Item Description Item Description Associated Diameter Stack From the drop-down list that includes all the Diameter Stack agents in the workflow, select the Diameter Stack that you want requests to be sent from.
title: Diameter Request Agent Configuration - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
